title: General Electric : number of employees 2005 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of employees in thousands. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Number of employees in thousands has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of employees in thousands, about 333.0 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Number of employees in thousands about 283.0 was reached at Year 2018
